text:
@RepThompson @SpeakerPelosi 3: And why did democrats also make a change to the Paycheck Protection Program ― a small business loan program Congress established in previous coronavirus legislation ― that would allow lobbying firms to apply for those loans? This makes you look bad.

#FOCUSONTHEPEOPLE!
